alert.note: Alert for Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 1:02AM CDT until March 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MONTAGUE AND COOKE COUNTIES... At 101 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Jo, or 16 miles southeast of Nocona, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Muenster, St. Jo, Lindsay, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Road Runner, Valley View, Prairie Point, Leo, Rosston, Bulcher, Capps Corner, Forestburg, Illinois Bend, Marysville, Sivells Bend, Era, Bonita and Hood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
